summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3437, for the improvement of the alley in block "L", Bell's 5th Addition being the alley between 4th Avenue and 5th Avenue, from Bell Street to Battery Street; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42634 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
